channel.title: 007 ownage development team ~ take a look ~
channel.description:
Welcome,
i have made a new server and i am recruiting people. Also my name in game is reece and the co-owner is zack. if you want to apply for a job please do it in this order:
To apply you MUST e-mail me or no job. heres my e-mail hamachi-serv@hotmail.co.uk set it out like this
[code] What placement do you wish to have: Why do you wish to sign up: Are you reliable and up for the job: Background experience (Atleast 5 sentences): [/code] Names on the list have 4 stages. Each are color coded. green: Just signed up. (Lasts for 1 day) yellow: Has not responded yet. blue: Currently doing his/her job. red: Job status pending.
Server Coders: 1. 2. 3.
Client Coders: 1. 2. 3.
Advertisers: 1. 2. 3.
Testers: 1. 2.

i have made a new server and i am recruiting people.
Also my name in game is reece and the co-owner is zack.
if you want to apply for a job please do it in this order:
